name: Riding Horse
movement: 60 ft., capable of navigating various terrains
description: A large, domesticated horse bred for speed and endurance, possessing a strong build and capable of carrying riders across long distances.
memorable: Utilized as a dependable mount for adventurers, known for its stamina and speed.
goals: Mainly serves as reliable transportation for travelers and soldiers.
relations: Commonly encountered alongside adventurers or in stables with other domesticated animals.
environment: Typically found in stables, farms, or accompanied by travelers and soldiers.
strengths: High Strength score of 16 allows it to effectively engage in melee hoof attacks.
weaknesses: Very low intelligence and charisma, limiting its cognitive abilities and understanding.
attacks: Can deliver powerful melee attacks with its hooves, dealing bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Has a strong charge with its hooves that can inflict significant damage.
senses: Possesses a passive perception of 10, indicating average awareness of surroundings.
additional_information: Spooked easily but can be trained for reliability.
Commonly used by messengers due to its speed.
Not aggressive, but capable of minor combat.
Bred for long distances rather than direct combat prowess.
Represents the quintessential mount for characters in quests.
test_queries: strong horse that can carry riders
reliable horse for knights and soldiers
